long_description: The Contact tire is the ideal choice for commuting on city streets in dry or wet conditions. Safety System puncture protection utilizes a polyamide nylon belt directly under the tread strip. Safety System puncture protection makes them virtually impervious to puncture and road debris. Tire is grooved to channel water from center to side threads for traction in wet road conditions.
short_description: The Contact tire is the ideal choice for commuting on city streets in dry or wet conditions.
